exp1.title: Invention Factory, IIT Gandhinagar
exp1.content: Invented a personalized device that alleviates the discomfort of Peripheral Neuropathy patients, offering tailored relief and improved quality of life.

exp2.title: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Prayagraj
exp2.content: Worked on Human-Robot Interaction and Robot Grasping through Vision Language Models to create more intuitive and responsive robotic systems.
